member.name: T:hist_mmorpg.Game
member.summary: Class representing game It will initialise all the game objects and control the flow of the game The control code from all the form classes will either be put in here or accessed from here For example, if a server gets an incoming message from a client and finds that it is some game action to be taken, it might send this to Game, where the precise action will be determined from the message, carried out and the result send back via server

member.summary: Processes a client request to hire an NPC by bidding

Within the ActionController will return PositiveInteger if a bid is not included or is invalid.
